author: James Peto
comment: This is a very good application but as I have been led to understand the app uses the IR port in the phone so unless your phone NOT watch has an IR port then don't try this application. If your phone does however have the IR port then this is a really nice easy app to use.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi James, thank you very much for your review! Yes you will need a phone or a tablet with a built-in IR transmitter in order to use the app. An IR transmitter on the watch is not required. In addition, we will soon add an extra option to send the IR signals through the IR port of the watch instead of the phone (depending on the watch). Best Wishes!
